title: Search & Discovery Features
description: Implement client-side search functionality and related posts recommendations to improve content discoverability

features.title: Client-Side Search
features.description: Fast, accessible search across all blog posts without backend

stories.title: Create search index generation script
stories.description: Build a script that generates a searchable JSON index from all published posts at build time, including title, excerpt, content, tags, and keywords
acceptance_criteria: Script runs during build process and generates search-index.json
Index includes all published posts with title, excerpt, content preview, tags, keywords, slug, and date
Index is optimized for size (< 50KB gzipped)
Script excludes draft posts and unpublished content
stories.technical_notes: Use existing getAllPosts() function and strip HTML/MDX tags from content

stories.title: Build search UI component
stories.description: Create accessible search input component with live results dropdown
acceptance_criteria: Search component appears in header with keyboard shortcut (Cmd/Ctrl+K)
Live search results appear as user types with debouncing (300ms)
Results show post title, excerpt preview, and matching tags
Keyboard navigation works (arrow keys, enter to navigate, escape to close)
ARIA labels and roles for screen reader accessibility
Empty state message when no results found
Neo-brutalist styling matches existing design system
stories.technical_notes: Use client component with useState for search query, implement simple string matching (can upgrade to FlexSearch later if needed)

stories.title: Add search results page
stories.description: Create dedicated /search page for displaying search results with URL parameter support
acceptance_criteria: Search page accessible at /search with query parameter (?q=term)
Shows search results in grid layout similar to blog listing page
Displays result count and search term
SEO meta tags with noindex to prevent duplicate content issues
Back button returns to previous page
Mobile responsive layout
stories.technical_notes: Use searchParams in Next.js 13+ App Router, reuse BlogCard component

features.title: Related Posts Recommendations
features.description: Show 'You might also like' section at end of blog posts

stories.title: Build related posts algorithm
stories.description: Create function to find related posts based on tag similarity and recency
acceptance_criteria: Function takes current post slug and returns 3 related posts
Algorithm prioritizes posts with matching tags (weighted scoring)
Excludes current post from results
Falls back to most recent posts if no tag matches
Returns empty array if fewer than 3 other posts exist
Performance optimized for build-time execution
stories.technical_notes: Add getRelatedPosts() function to lib/posts.ts using tag intersection scoring

stories.title: Create RelatedPosts UI component
stories.description: Build visual component to display related posts at end of blog post
acceptance_criteria: Component displays 3 related posts in horizontal grid (responsive to 1 column on mobile)
Each post shows thumbnail, title, excerpt, and tags
Neo-brutalist card design with thick borders and hard shadows
Hover state with subtle transform animation (respects prefers-reduced-motion)
Semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy
Links to related posts with focus indicators
stories.technical_notes: Reuse existing BlogCard component or create simplified variant

success_criteria: Search functionality accessible from header with keyboard shortcut
Search results appear within 300ms of typing
Related posts section appears on all blog post pages
All features maintain WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
notes: Search can start with simple string matching; advanced fuzzy search (FlexSearch) can be added later if needed
